## ResolutionTools.deriveLeafId() function

Derives a leaf ID from a full resource ID. Extracts the last segment after the final dot.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function deriveLeafId(fullResourceId: string): Result<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fullResourceId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Full resource ID (e.g., 'platform.languages.az-AZ')


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;string&gt;

Result containing the leaf ID (e.g., 'az-AZ') or error if invalid format

## Example


```typescript
const leafResult = deriveLeafId('platform.languages.az-AZ');
if (leafResult.isSuccess()) {
  console.log(leafResult.value); // 'az-AZ'
}

const invalidResult = deriveLeafId('invalid');
if (invalidResult.isFailure()) {
  console.log(invalidResult.message); // 'Resource ID must contain at least one dot'
}
```
